product.title: Beech Sylvared
product.description:
## Junckers Beech SylvaRed hardwood floor, adds a touch of elegance to any room.

Stained Beech that reproduces a wonderfully warm rich tropical hardwood floor with variance in color but from a sustainable managed European source

The warm reddish glow is achieved by means of coloring the wood throughout in combination with a slightly redtoned surface. This makes this wooden floor an interesting and noble alternative to the exotic wood species. 

Beech is one of Europeâ€™s most common hardwood species and the excellent strength properties in combination with a uniform structure make beech very suitable for floors. 

This floor is also available as ships decking. The black neoprene strip placed between the boards adds a maritime look to the floor.
